sourcesContent:
<template>
    <input type="text" id="datepicker" class="form-control" v-model="this.getDate" @click="getDatepicker()" />
    {{ getDate }}
</template>

<script>
import $ from "jquery"
export default {
    name: "MyDatepicker",
    props: [
        "getDate",
    ],
    methods: {
        getDatepicker() {            
            $(document).ready(() => {
                $('#datepicker').datepicker({
                    format: "dd/mm/yyyy",
                    autoclose: true,
                    toggleActive: true,
                });
                $('#datepicker').change(() => {
                    this.datetime.getDate = $('#datepicker').val();
                });
            });
        },
    }
}
</script>
